attributes.review: In a brand new Jumanji adventure, four high school kids discover an old video game console and are drawn into the game's jungle setting, literally becoming the adult avatars they chose. What they discover is that you don't just play Jumanji - you must survive it. To beat the game and return to the real world, they'll have to go on the most dangerous adventure of their lives, discover what Alan Parrish left 20 years ago, and change the way they think about themselves - or they'll be stuck in the game forever, to be played by others without break
attributes.title: Jumanji

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible. I downloaded it as a platform for educating myself but it was downright terrible. So much misinformation and I heard it actually killed people. As soon as I downloaded it my phone started crashing every thirty seconds and I got a virus on my phone that wouldn't go away. I finally located the name of the virus and it was called dtrump2020. Avoid this virus at all costs- it caused my friends whom I text to be killed and kidnapped. What kind of app creator would let this happen?! It's absolutely ridiculous.
attributes.title: Don't download
